website_summaries.verdict: A quality casein protein powder endorsed by a renowned figure within the bodybuilding industry. Choose it if you appreciate transparent, easy to understand ingredients.
pros: Micellar casein keeps muscles in an anabolic state for prolonged periods
Contains coconut oil powder to slow casein breakdown
Low in carbs, fat, and sodium
Delivers 25g of high quality protein at 150 calories per serving
Simple ingredients with no artificial colors or flavors
cons: Flavors can be a bit hit and miss
Fine textured powder is somewhat messy

customer_reviews.title: A daily casein that won’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This is the best casein protein out there. Awesome taste for both the chocolate and vanilla, it mixes amazing as well. You can add a little water or almond milk and make a pudding or throw it in a smoothie, either way I use this daily!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W DePaolantonio

customer_reviews.title: but after making the change to Kaged Muscle Kasein I have a new favorite. KM kasein mixes easy
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking casein protein before bed for 6 years. The muscle density benefits are obvious as opposed to drinking whey protein. Throughout the whole 6 years my choice was Optimum Nutrition's casein protein, but after making the change to Kaged Muscle Kasein I have a new favorite. KM kasein mixes easy, tastes good, and maintains my muscle while I sleep. This is my go to protein of consumption throughout the day as well.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my blood sugars while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I'm type 1 diabetic and helps me from dropping to low throughout the night or blood sugars getting to high.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well. Tastes Great. In fact mixed with vanilla flavored unsweetened almond milk, it's an amazing milkshake. Best of all, you can trust Kaged Muscle products to not only do what they say they do, but to not have tainted ingredients or less protein than stated.
customer_reviews.author: Tarzanboy

customer_reviews.title: Effective, delicious, and natural
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the many of the competitors, Kaged Muscle’s Kasein shake is much more thicker and creamier. I’ve generally found a lot of artificial ingredients and chemicals in the other brands. With Kasein shake, that’s not the case. You can feel it in the texture of the powder itself. Typical commercial casein shake powders will have a sandy texture that feels like artificial fabric to the touch. However, Kasein powder has a smooth texture that feels like natural cotton to the touch. The taste is amazing. A perfect pre-bed meal after a hard day in the gym - whether you’re building muscle or leaning out.
customer_reviews.author: Aku Ganaesh

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I like how Kaged muscle makes a less expensive cold processed casein protein. However, the taste of stevia is so strong I can't even drink this. Plus it has sucralose in it! The taste is horrible, I close my eyes and force it down, and that is coming from someone who eats at the galley in the Navy. What a shame, I really wanted to like this product as all the other cold processed casein proteins are more than eighty dollars. Looks like it's back to Optimum, where it also has bad ingredients like sucralose but the taste is doable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried several protein shakes and this one is by far my fiancées favorite! Great product. A little expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Udstad III

customer_reviews.title: Was very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This lasted me quite a while and I saw pretty good results with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Decker

customer_reviews.title: Plug Your Nose and Chase it Down
customer_reviews.text: The flavor leaves a lot to be desired. It also doesn't mix well no matter how long I shake it. Often times it clumps and sticks to the lid or mouth of the bottle. I'm always glad when I finally get it down and will be happier once it is gone so I can buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Won't be getting this again.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is chalky and has a strange odor(reminds me of 90s protein powder), the stuff doesn't mix well and it funks up my shakers. I gave it 5 stars for presentation because it looks nice and I lucked out getting the scooper on top. Everything else is subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: As someone with multiple food intolerances, including dairy, gluten, high fructose...I was extremely cautious about trying this. But I am happy to say I have zero issues with it, KM products are a really great brand, no hidden ingredients...just decent quality products. Sure one can argue they’re expensive...but weigh it up...do you want a tub full of fillers...or a tub full of high quality ingredients?
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: Kaged muscle is my favorite supplement brand. But this is not the best tasting protein... well idk if it's the taste do much as it is just really thick and if you like your protein that way you will like this. I personally dont like thick protein it makes it weird.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Most Delicious Casein Powder EVER.
customer_reviews.text: Nearly every night for the better part of ten years I've had a scoop of casein prior to racking out, this stuff is hands down the best, most delicious, incredible casein powder I've ever had... mixes outstanding, tastes even better, and the gains speak for themselves. Keep yourself fed overnight with this thing right here.
customer_reviews.author: mattassmith

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Sorry tastes horrible Didn’t expect that from Gethin as he used to recommend great tasting products.... before he started own line.
customer_reviews.author: Delmo

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's go to product for casein protein. The quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Good
customer_reviews.text: I always loved the taste of Myoplex. This protein powder, while not as tasty as the Myoplex chocolate (which we can't get anymore), is very good and probably the best chocolate protein powder I have found since Myoplex was discontinued. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Would like it if they would get rid of sucralose
customer_reviews.author: Shane Stilwell

customer_reviews.title: Decent taste and great quality
customer_reviews.text: For Casein, it’s the best I’ve had and I usually use 4oz of milk and 8oz of water. In a blender bottle shaking for about 1-2 minutes will break it all up no problem. Just use some muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Moore

customer_reviews.title: Slow to blend
customer_reviews.text: It was really slow to blend. It did not taste that good but it might good for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good, and blends well. If you like a thicker shake then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary D. Shain

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Still using it. Pretty good stuff, I use it when I plan to sleep more than 7 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Watabu

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: This protein is one of the few i don't have stomach issues with. It fills me up and satisfies my hunger cravings.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Another great protein power
customer_reviews.text: Am in my late 40ish using this product for weight loss and muscle mass growth. So far like all other kaged muscle products it great. Mixes easy and taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Palluck

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great! It's pretty clean in terms of additives and it's good and heavy like casein should be, I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: M Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Beat casein for your money
customer_reviews.text: Can't get much better than this especially for the money. Before used ON Casein and that gave me gas and bloating. KM also has less chemicals and taste better and more natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I still remember when I would drink other brands like optimum or dymatize and feel like I just ate ...
customer_reviews.text: Because of the fermentation process, this casein protein aits well in your stomach. I still remember when I would drink other brands like optimum or dymatize and feel like I just ate a brick. It tastes great and mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Kaged muscle kasein
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!!! Especially when mixed with almond milk! It’s delicious
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lumps
customer_reviews.text: Powder doesn’t mix well .. I see lumps and taste sucks
customer_reviews.author: Kranthi Vodnala

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Kaged Muscle Kasein is by far my favorite Casein protein. It tastes better than any other casein protein I’ve had before and is great in recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Taste is amazing and I'm a big fan of Kris Gethin! Reordering soon!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Mansour

customer_reviews.title: Better options out there.
customer_reviews.text: Funky taste. Very artificial tasting and reminds me of powdery, cheap chocolate bars.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Kravchenko

customer_reviews.title: My new go to
customer_reviews.text: With water, the flavor is better than most, but nothing to scream wow about, however, when you mix with milk, be it almond, coconut, etcetera, the flavor is superior to others I've tried. I use this in the morning with milk to get my day going, and also at night with water before bed at the recommendation of some workout buddies. As a diabetic my morning sugars have been lower since using this product, but remember that not everyone is the same and your results might be different.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Taste kinda chemical like. I dont know. Its good though. Like melted ice cream or something, hard to explain. Anyways, it mixes easy, and does what it should. Take before bed. Just don't premix it and leave it in the fridge. It gets all thick. Cause that's what Kasein does. Its a slow digesting protein. But if your looking at this you probably already know that.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Flavor needs improvement 😔
customer_reviews.text: Taste & digestion is hard to swallow 🤭 Not cheap either 💸 now I’m stuck with this huge container I wish I never bought! I’m sure it’s of high quality being this brand but I’ll never buy this again 👎 chocolate 🍫 more like chalk-late 😣 Pass on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This was my first foray into Casein protein, I did a lot of research of various brands and took a chance on this. I purchased Chocolate, and I am very happy with it. I like the taste, it pretty much tastes like Chocolate milk when mixed, you can add or lessen the water to get the desired consistency. I have not tasted Casein from anyone else, so I can't compare this to anything else, but I am satisfied with my purchase. The only thing I wasn't super excited about was the Carrageenan that is added as a thickener I am assuming, something else or the omission of this would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Embrey III

customer_reviews.title: Terrible,horrible, no good very bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! Bleck! Yuck! This is the worst casein powder I've ever tasted. It is highly artificial tasting, disgustingly sacrine, and I couldn't finish it. The saddest part is how good their other products are! This is just vile!
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Great protein, mixed up with oatmeal gives you perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Great protein, mixed up with oatmeal gives you perfect breakfast. Keeps me full till lunch, for cost roughly $1.50 per serving... Vanilla taste great, and no bloating!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I add skim or silk milk taste great! I use it every morning and at night before bed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Super Good - Smooth. Only drawback is its super fine white powder that gets messy. The power is also so fine it sticks to the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: beardman

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate is good!
customer_reviews.text: It's good. I don't usually like chocolate because it tastes chalky .. but this Kasein has a pretty good flavor, and it blends well. Also the amount you get for the price is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: use this product and the difference is amazing! Try the Kaged muscle products for yourself
customer_reviews.text: Again ... use this product and the difference is amazing! Try the Kaged muscle products for yourself... you'll not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dew

customer_reviews.title: Best Casein Powder Available
customer_reviews.text: This is the best, and I do mean BEST, Casein protein powder available bar none. It is so pure that it's even nearly lactose free (less than 1% lactose). Most of the big brand names can't say that.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: Taste like powder concrete I mix pb2 in it to make it bearable wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Super flavor and mixes well. Is a very fine powder which tends to be messy, but all the other positives drown that out.
customer_reviews.author: A.J’s

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: Protein powders are usually not the best tasting, but this stuff makes everything delicious.
customer_reviews.author: jesse simenson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad taste good for my night time protien shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Been using it for about 6 months now by recommendation of my trainer and am really enjoying it. The flavor is great and it is not gritty. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: breal33

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good for night smoothies! Goves a really good consistent texture and tastes great too!
customer_reviews.author: serhad ketsamanian

customer_reviews.title: Yes Chocolate. No vanilla.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the chocolate flavor before and I can say for sure that the vanilla flavor is not that great. Buy the chocolate flavor instead
customer_reviews.author: Hrsh

customer_reviews.title: Thee best casein out there
customer_reviews.text: Thee best casein out there. Tastes great and comes in two days. Way better than having to wait 4-5 days and pay for shipping on bodybuilding.com
customer_reviews.author: Jared M

customer_reviews.title: Kasein is your new pancake syrup.
customer_reviews.text: Best bed time snack and frosting on top for pancakes
customer_reviews.author: PHILend62

customer_reviews.title: if your commenting on flavor you make yourself sound like a b*tch
customer_reviews.text: This is quality protein... the flavor is... WHO CARES? if your commenting on flavor you make yourself sound like a b*tch. Buy a product that has what your looking for in quality ingredients, flavor is the last thing I am concerned about... this tastes like slightly doughy vanilla cake, not my favorite but i don't buy protein powder based on how it tastes
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Smoothest supp ever :O
customer_reviews.text: I've never really used any kind of Casein before, until I was introduced to Kaged Muscle products. I transitioned from Optimum Nutrition and I'm so glad I did! Kasein has one of the smoothest tastes I've ever had in a sup, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeDan

customer_reviews.title: but definitely on the better side of the taste spectrum
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the chalky side compared to other casein powders I have used, but definitely on the better side of the taste spectrum. I have yet to have a casein powder that tastes good, but this is definitely one of the most bearable to down every night.
customer_reviews.author: Jef

customer_reviews.title: Chalky taste and clumps
customer_reviews.text: This protein is definitely chalky and clumps easily. I have definitely tasted and had worse proteins, but do not think the benefits of this protein warrant the below average taste.
customer_reviews.author: endtime

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good and keeps you full!
customer_reviews.text: The Vanilla shake flavour is amazing!! I unfortunately had it at room temperature water but I think the colder it is, the better it tastes. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Prabhdeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: First impression was that it didnt taste too good, very artificial vanilla ive had alot better ones
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for new casein power. First impression was that it didnt taste too good, very artificial vanilla ive had alot better ones. But to be honest, I am getting use to it. It still tastes weird, but it grows on you. I tried many protein powder before, this is the only one where when I scoop the powder out, the powder sticks to the scooper and doesnt come out. all other protein powder I have used has never encountered a problem like this before. Its really messy. The website says it has 10g of amino acid, but on the supplemental fact or anywhere on the container, it says nothing about it. So does it or does it not......
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Why the carrageenan Kris??
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, tastes better than the other Casein proteins (they're all weird.) I did get some sort of insulin spike after taking it the first time that I don't get with other products but it went away after 5 min. Was on the fence because of the risks of Casein but the carrageenan broke the deal for me. Rekaged is the best protein.
customer_reviews.author: BruceWayne305

product_meta.title: Kaged Muscle Kasein Protein Powder, Miceller Casein Supplement, Chocolate Shake, 25 Servings
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate Shake| Size:2 Pound (Pack of 1)Manufactured using an innovative micronization process, Kaged Muscle casein is an ultra-premium cold-processed micellar casein protein powder that delivers a sustained release of amino acids to help prevent muscle breakdown.* This filtration method preserves the structural integrity of the protein, ensuring that the finished product retains the natural micellar structure found in milk. Because casein proteins are ph-sensitive, the sustained release of amino acids makes this product ideal as a nighttime meal or during prolonged periods throughout the day without protein intake. Kaged Muscle casein is a true game-changing anti-catabolic protein that slowly and continuously feeds the muscles a steady supply of muscle-building essential amino acids for several hours. This allows your body to maintain a positive nitrogen balance and long-term anabolic state that can help prevent muscle protein breakdown.* the days of gritty-textured casein protein powders are gone thanks to the Caged muscle’s R&D team, who used natural flavors and colors to create an incredibly smooth and delicious protein, available in Chocolate and Vanilla flavors. Quality is enhanced by The fact that all ingredients in Kaged Muscle KASEIN are third-party tested or purity and potency. Casein contains no soy lecithin, is Gluten Free and banned-substance free, and contains less than 1 gram of Lactose per serving. Each tub of Kaged Muscle casein has 100 percent ingredient transparency on the label so you know exactly what you’re putting into your body. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: Anti-catabolic – each serving contains 25 g of ultra-premium cold-pressed micellar casein isolate for a sustained-release protein that helps prevent muscle breakdown*
Improve muscle recovery – Kaged Muscle kasein is a complete protein that gives you essential amino acids to help repair and rebuild muscle during recovery*
Maximize muscle Gains – Scientifically proven to boost protein synthesis and enhance gains in size and strength*
Premium manufactured – Kaged Muscle kasein is manufactured using an innovative microfiltration process that preserves the structural integrity of the protein
Transparent labelling – each tub of Kaged Muscle kasein has 100 percent ingredient transparency on the label so you know exactly what you’re putting into your body
